alert.note: Alert for Northern Nassau; Northwest Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 28 at 3:21AM EST until January 29 at 7:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 9 to 14 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Near blizzard conditions are possible for a period on Saturday. * WHERE...Portions of southern Connecticut and southeast New York. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will become very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Northern Nassau; Northwest Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk
